entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a young boy who is about to start learning magic.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, who helps Harry with his preparations for school.

entities.name: knuts
entities.description: The wizard currency used by the characters in the story.

entities.name: london
entities.description: A city where Hagrid needs to go to buy Harry's school supplies.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Harry's uncle, who is reluctant to pay for Harry's education at Hogwarts.

entities.name: harry's parents
entities.description: The parents of the main character, whose house was destroyed and left Harry without any inheritance.

relationships.description: Hagrid needs to go to London to buy Harry's school supplies.
Hagrid helps Harry with his preparations for school.
Uncle Vernon is reluctant to pay for Harry's education at Hogwarts, creating an obstacle for Harry.
Hagrid pays for the knuts with the money he gives to Harry.
Harry is the inheritor of his parents' estate, but their house was destroyed and left him without any inheritance.
